name: Archery Range
description: So, this is a really simple game I made as part of my Game Development class, and was my second attempt at making a proper game by myself, overall. It's not great, but I still feel it's at least okay for what my skill level was then. It should be free of any major glitches or bugs, but there are some that I was never able to resolve, like hit detection. There are no updates currently being planned for this. I'd still call in "complete" because the only missing thing is a pause function.
